nodes.text: The Glite-Ven hostilities were a conflict fought in the Glite-Ven system. By the year 2 ABY, the crime lord Ploovo Two-For-One had acquired the modified EV-series supervisor droid EV-4D9 during the hostilities.
The Glite-Ven hostilities were first mentioned in Alliance Intelligence Reports, a 1995 Star Wars Legends supplement written by Bill Smith for Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game.
